akn:section.akn:heading: Office of Research on Women’s Health

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Establishment There is established within the Office of the Director of NIH an office to be known as the Office of Research on Women’s Health (in this part referred to as the “Office”). The Office shall be headed by a director, who shall be appointed by the Director of NIH and who shall report directly to the Director.
